name: OR_LNLG_COUNTS_SEARCH_ALL
description: The OR_LNLG_COUNTS_SEARCH_ALL table contains information on which areas of the room were searched.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: COUNT_SEARCH_AREAS_ALL_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value for which areas of the room were searched for missing items.
